The boy sets out on this quest after learning that the Water of Life is needed to make his village happy.  On the way, he meets gods, demons... Soon, he discovers that the evil snake has stolen the Water, and he heads for the snake's palace. Defeating the snake is not easy since it has the Water of Life to revive itself.
